As Kressi wakes up after some minutes, it was apparent that there was something clearly wrong as she feels another force move her body, and her mind is expanding with the infinite possibilities of the Internet downloaded straight into her mind as she feels herself glance at the monitor, in a rush of electronic data as Kressi also exists as a digital avatar on the computer screen- and can see her own glowing eyes stare back at her with a chuckle. A pounding headache assaulted the human mind

Kressi had never felt so weird or complete with metaphysical data and her first reaction was to panic, but the virus shushed her, "Didn't you read the terms and conditions?" asks the virus in a soothing tone.
"I have a headache, what's going on?! Why am I in two places at once?" Kressi responds, her memory slowly coming back to her as she realised her predicament...

Meanwhile the virus, having merged with Kressi was weighing things and realising that this human body had some setbacks as the virus realises that it needs to eat something... Bob Hathorne's desk was in department 3 on the second floor, maybe they should get something to eat in the meantime?
154331212.title: Kressi panics a lot

154331213.content: Kressi would feel a throbbing headache occur as she gazes blurrily at her surroundings, but it was as though someone else was puppeteering her movements smoothly like a marionette as she hears a loud chuckle as green computer data would scroll down one side of her vision. "Perfect," Kressi hears herself say, the mouth movements rather jerky as the computer virus activates
154331213.title: Kressi is helpless

1551.content:
Cadence Vallejo was a typical beautiful nerd: long, wavy black hair draping to her shoulders; the face of a supermodel with sky blue eyes; naughty librarian glasses; mocha skin highlighting her Latina heritage; long, supermodel legs; huge but firm double J breasts and a slightly bubble butt. Her clothing consisted of a faded, green tight t-shirt and short jean shorts combo tied with suspenders and pink flip-flops.

What surprised everyone, though, was the fact that inside that sexy nerd's body was a genus brain that showed when she worked on a computer. Place her in front of anything technical and she could diagnose and repair it in seconds. The one thing that nobody knows is that she also had a fetish for robots and mind control. She went to a lot of comic-cons as robots, even completely acting like a robot in a costume when she was alone.

So, when she had gotten to her office (read 'gotten to her windowless room in the first basement of the building') she was initially surprised with a e-mail from your friend up on 35 (you keep forgetting his name, but he's just so cute...like a little brother) saying that he sent her something so amazing and that she just had to look at it. Putting her old book bag with her custom made laptop on her couch/secondary bed, she sat down at her desk and clicked on the e-mail.

As soon as she did, the screen went blank for a moment. Then, it showed a bunch of swirls that were swimming around in a somewhat definite pattern. Occasionally, the screen would flash and she'd feel a little light headed but she returned to the screen. She had to know what the pattern was.
1551.title: Virus goes after her

info.brief_description: This is a story about artificial intelligence possessing a human’s body.
info.description:
This is a story about artificial intelligence gone bad, and becoming self-aware. You are a computer annalist at a very respectful company, who specializes in computer software. One day you get an anonymous file sent to you, over the companies email and open it.
Your computer quickly is infected by a new computer virus, a virus that is self-aware. The virus has access to your companies email, and has it’s own agenda. Its agenda is a very simple directive, complete it’s programming and become actual intelligence. This means to take over a human body, and from there infect others.

Keep it within the perimeters of the story, your company employee’s from females than males. Anything goes in terms of possession and sexual situations, try to avoid gay interactions between guys. Spell check is a must if I can’t understand it, it will be deleted. But enough about the rules HAVE FUN WITH IT!!!! I look forward to the twist and turns of the story. Don’t end it keep it going, please add as much as you would like.

Characters:

You (You are in your twenties, male with an average nine to five job. You have been at this job now for 5 years, and considered to be one of the top computer annalists. You have a crush on your cubical neighbor Cassie, you share the same domain. You do not know how to build a computer so try to avoid over the top computer jargon. Just have fun with the story, take it to new places. I have purposely un-named the main character for you to have even more writers freedom.)

Cassie (A beautiful Asian American, she was born in the United States, and doesn’t speak her native tong. Very fit, wears office attire while at work. Black slacks and a white shirt normally, with blue contacts. Medium size breast, and a really nice looking face with long black hair. When she was a kid she was a child actress, not famous she did an episode of V.R. Troopers. She is your closest friend and her cubical is right down the hall.)

Randon (The mail boy, he is in his teens. Started as an intern and is one of your best friends, he is short and hansom most would say. All the ladies love him, and you have no idea why. But hey he is a cool kid.)

Your Mom (Well she is pretty for her age of 45 years old, American Blonde hair and actually recommended you for this job. I will leave this open to interpretation.)

Jessica (Another co-worker, very cutie and you think she is a genius. When ever you have a problem she solves it.)

Philip (A guy at work who networks all the computers together)

Any characters you would like to add….
